QuestData.Title: Mathias Needs You
QuestData.Description: We've had some good times. I'm really sorry to see you go. But, Mathias says he needs you.$B$BHe said it's urgent!$B$BSo, you want to grab a drink or something after whatever, $g buddy : lady;?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Master Mathias Shaw at the Twilight Citadel in the Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Good, you're back. We know where Cho'gall's ultimate weapon is located!
